description: This file defines an interface IController within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace. The interface includes methods for managing device or application controllers, such as persisting state, deleting resources, rebooting, and retrieving or setting configuration and environment data.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for controlling and managing application or device states, marked as deprecated and external.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource specified by the path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the environment variables associated with the specified index.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the configuration for a given callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clones configuration from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
